message:
SYSTEM: 20200423_EOSC.pdf: Página 22
Open Science Update
A few changes due to COVID-19
We will create the UPM portal for COVID-19 and 
SARS-COV-2
Similar (with less resources) to
o https://www.covid19dataportal.org/
Reusing ideas from ACTION data portal
o Create a UPM community in Zenodo
o Associate Research Artefacts with the UPM community and 
with the COVID-19 community from Zenodo
o Show it in a dedicated portal
22
speaker: SYSTEM
